page.title: 03DONNA PEACOCK-ONE OF MY DAYS
page.content: On a school day I wake up at 8.00.I get my clothes on quick for it is a bit chilly.I then go downstairs and brush my hair,go into the kitchen and have a wash.For my breakfast I usually have a boiled egg or cereal like cornflakes.By now it is 8.15.I get on my shoes and get 15p for the bus and for my dinner money 50p.I get off the bus.I walk a little way to school.At 8.55 we have registration.The second bell rings at 9.00 that means that if anyone is late they get detention.The bell rings again at 9.15 our first lesson begins.At dinnertime I either go home or go to the chippy.Then it is school again at 1.15.After our lessons it is 3.40 when the bell rings again.I get home and have my tea early for my mum goes to work early.Then I call for my friend Cristina.We either go on our bikes,play games or watch T.V.till 10.
